TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you can eat this pizza when it cools down from ten million degrees.

I wish grass would always stop growing once it gets four inches tall.

Granted, but things like wheat and oats are grasses, too. They no longer mature and produce food, plunging the world into a massive agricultural crisis and leading to mass starvation.

I wish for a sequel to Inside Out where Riley becomes a teenager and gets some kind of mental illness, and has to take medication for it. I just think it would be interesting to see how an issue like this would be characterized.

Granted. But since you are the only one who is interested in that, the movie is never finished.

I wish for a nice, warm chocolate chip cookie with a glass of milk.

Granted. It turns out your warm cookie is actually burning hot, and you burn off all your taste buds, never to taste again. Oh yeah, and the milk is rancid.

 

I wish that I could hold all these feels.

Granted, you become a Vulcan in an alternate universe where Star Trek was awful and nobody liked it.

I wish I controlled an army of robotic bees.

Granted, but they develop a mind of their own and sting the humans to death, starting with you

I wish Brazil becomes a global superpower in all aspects on par, and allied with the USA

Okay, but the government is now akin to that of North Korea, and you are at the bottom of the social ladder.

I wish to be fluent in Spanish (without losing my knowledge of English)

Edited August 24, 2016 by pTrevTrevs

fak, that's a nightmare too close to RL

granted, but now you're a cuban living in cuba who also speaks english fluently

I wish Burger King was free and every ingredient of their sandwich the same as it is now, but magically healthy, just so the taste doesn't change at all

Granted, but as a result, the entire franchise is cursed, so whoever eats it dies. Congrats! You just killed half the world's population! Sweet dreams! 

 

I wish for a KSP meme.

Edited August 24, 2016 by Mycroft

Granted, the forums become filled with nothing but dank memes.

 

I wish for a cheeseburger.

granted, but it is a X-Ratão (here, try to turn on the subtitles so you can get the reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YBeRWEHxf8Q )

I wish I was a successful businessman

Granted, your hair and skin turn orange.

Hey, love him or hate him, I can see no reason for anyone to want orange skin.

I wish I could visit Middle Earth.

granted, you die in the first battle

I wish we had a place where could live the ancient roman/greek/carthaginian/egyptian/spartan times in the 21st century

(also, I actually support him, so that wasn't quite corrupted)

Granted. They spark a world war.

I wish I had moar likes!

More than 25, that is.

Sure, but your entire existence now revolves around the acquisition of likes. Nothing else matters to you, not even your physical well-being. You retreat into the mountains, live in a cave, and eat raw fish, all the while whispering to yourself about how many likes you have, until "likes" is the only word you still know how to pronounce.

I wish I owned an American Civil War era musket.

Granted. It blows up in your face when you try and fire it.

I wish the London Ringways had been built more like they were planned.

Granted, but they get blown up by an asteroid a day after construction is finished.

I wish I remembered whether I'd already beat Super Mario Sunshine before playing it on DolphinVR.

Granted. You can remember that, but nothing else (not even how to breathe)

I wish for pizza

Edited August 26, 2016 by OrbitalBuzzsaw

Granted. I eat it slowly in front of you.

I wish pTrevTrevs wanted a Mosin instead.

Granted, but I have no idea what that means.

I wish that this wish cannot be corrupted.

Granted, but then YOU get corrupted.

I wish I could have a cuttlefish.

Granted, but it's not cuddly.  Get it? No? Okay fine. Your cuttlefish is constantly camouflaging himself so you lose him and never find him.

I wish for uhhhhhhh.... Hmmmm... I wish I could build small as well as big.

Granted. You receive a set of micro-Lego

 

I wish legoclone09's Mosin to become a better firearm, preferably a Lee-Enfield SMLE

Granted, but you accidentally shoot yourself.

I wish that people would stop yelling at each other in my Dres mission thread.

Edited August 26, 2016 by KAL 9000

Granted. Nobody posts. 

I wish I could give more than 25 likes a day. ( @pTrevTrevs misunderstood it earlier, so let's try again.)
